enterEmailToInvite: enter the email of the person you want to invite
confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove that member from your organization ? It will be marked as a public decision from you, so make sure you have the right to do so according to your governance.
notInAnyTeam: Not a member of any team
leaveOrgWarning: Leaving will unassign you from all roles in this organization. Your roles will be transferred to the relevant team leaders.
leaveOrgDisabledOwner: You cannot leave this organization because you are the owner. Transfer ownership first in the organization settings.
leaveOrgDisabledFirstTeamLeader: You cannot leave because you are the leader of the founding team. Reassign the leader role before leaving.
leaveOrgConfirmDescription: This action is permanent. Once you leave, you will need a new invitation to rejoin.
leaveOrgBullet1: You will be unassigned from {{count}} role(s)
leaveOrgBullet2: Your roles will be transferred to the leaders of their respective teams
leaveOrgBullet3: You will lose access to all organization data
leaveOrgDecisionNote: This action will be recorded in the decision journal.
leaveOrgFailed: Failed to leave the organization. Please try again.

diagram.memberRemovedDescription: This member may have been removed from the organization.
diagram.memberDetailsAriaLabel: Member details for {{name}} showing {{roleCount}} roles across {{teamCount}} teams
diagram.srMemberAnnouncement: Now viewing member: {{name}}. This member has {{roleCount}} roles across {{teamCount}} teams. Press Escape to return. Press C to show contact information.
